basics.name: Vishal Nedungadi
basics.label: ML Researcher
basics.summary: I am an AI enthusiast leveraging deep learning and computer vision to tackle real-world challenges for a sustainable future.

work.name: Pioneer Center for AI, University of Copenhagen
work.summary: Researching on improving representations learning methods in the area of remote sensing. The goal is to construct a new multi-modal global dataset of satellite images and evaluate this dataset on a set of downstream tasks.

work.name: Division of Geoinformatics, KTH university
work.summary: Researched on Wildfire detection in sentinel 1 and sentinel 2 images using deep learning.

education.institution: KTH Royal Institute of Technology, Stockholm, Sweden
